title: Microsoft to invest 4.3 billion euros in Italy for AI infrastructure and cloud capacity
description: The investment will be the company's largest in Italy to date, Microsoft said.
content: Microsoft said in a statement on Wednesday it would invest 4.3 billion euros ($4.75 billion) over the next two years to strengthen artificial intelligence (AI) infrastructure and cloud capacity in Italy. The investment will be the company's largest in Italy to date, Microsoft added.
